website_summaries.verdict: If you're after an inexpensive ultracompact with good low-light photos, the Canon PowerShot Elph 100 HS is one to get. But you'd better act fast.
pros: The Canon PowerShot Elph 100 HS is a very good value, offering good photo and video quality outside and indoors, lots of fun shooting modes, and decent shooting performance for its class
cons: The 100 HS' photos look soft, even at lower ISOs, and its autofocus is regularly inaccurate

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: My family really likes this camera, and we use it quite frequently. We bought it about six months ago and it has held up well. Here are the pros and cons. Pros: Lightweight, fits well in your hand. Button placement makes sense. Instructions and controls are easy to understand. Very clear pictures. Decent battery life. Quick capture - which helps with a fast moving toddler! Nice looking camera, not bulky at all. Cons: Not as many features as others in its line. I'm fairly certain it would break on impact - from dropping or something like that. I always use the wrist band that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: adjsbb

customer_reviews.title: An amazing piece of engineering.
customer_reviews.text: I researced this camera and ordered it through Amazon for $109.00. I was very surprised when I started using this camera. The camera has so many features that were missing from my previous cameras. I recently video taped my Grandaughter's first communion and it turned out great. But, when I tried to transfer the video to disk using the included Zoombrowser 6.5, I found it did not recognize a dvd format. I did get the movie recorded to dvd through my recorder but extra information was recorded along the perimeters. If anyone else has had this problem and found a solution, I would appreciate a response.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera!
customer_reviews.text: "This is a must-have camera. For a point & shoot, it brags more shooting settings than I've seen on this small a camera. I esp like the "best shot" setting and the "low light" settings. But - the most important is the ability to shoot in low light without flash and still give a clear image without much digital noise. This is the best of the "Elf" series cameras I have used yet, and the 12 MP image it produces just adds to it's capabilities. You can't go wrong with this little 'carry everywhere' image maker. A++
customer_reviews.author: Edwin I. Plimpton

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for everyday use. Starts up super fast which is nice when you're trying to capture something on the fly. Can't figure out some settings. Menus are kind of confusing and that makes me mad because really, how hard should it be to use a digital camera?! I'm only 23 and I'd like to think I'm pretty electronic savvy, couldn't imagine my mother trying to figure this thing out. But overall pretty happy with it. Picture quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Everything we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera to replace our Kodak Easy Share which took TERRIBLE photos! A family friend had a Canon similar to this that we'd been wanting for years. We purchased this model for the the features, specifically things like Color Accent and Fisheye Lens which we didn't have in our other camera. In addition- even a simple photo of nothing is far better quality than any other camera we've owned. Obviously, we're not well educated photographers, but I am confident that this camera will take great quality photos- for the quality, you can't beat the price! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: canon powershot elph 100 hs
customer_reviews.text: I just received my camera today and as described looks like new but used with minor scratches on the bottom, I have to say I do have a brand new one right now and had to buy another one because my son loved the way this camera functions. The pictures under low lighting is amazing compared to his casio ex z150 point and shoot camera. Even researched comparing to other point and shoot cameras worth 2-300 dollars, this have a better rating with lower megapixels.
customer_reviews.author: baste boy

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed an easy to use point and shoot camera for all occasions. After reading the reviews on Amazon I ordered it with high expectations. The camera lives up to its reviews. It is compact and yes the buttons on the back are small but these are the only faults I can find with this camera. The Auto mode works so well for most every shot with the picture quality as good as I could hope for. The Cannon software allows the camera to interface with your computer seamlessly. Like most other reviews if you are looking for a relatively low cost point and shoot camera you cannot go wrong with this Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: A great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I originally bought this camera because of the positive reviews for it already posted on Amazon.com and it lived up to it's praise quite well. I bought it to take to Europe and left it on auto setting all of the time. I got very good pictures in low light situations and the stained glass windows in the cathedrals which are often hard to photograph turned out amazingly well with this camera. For convenience, ease of use, quality and size, this slim point and shoot camera does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: slarus

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, light weight, compact camera. I have been impressed with the picture quality. The only problem I have, is the auto focus. We have a new grandchild, and by the time I push the button and the auto focus has to adjust, I usually miss the smiles! I am very pleased with the purchase price I got on Amazon, especially with the free one day shipping! I had this camera in less than 15 hours from the time I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100HS Review
customer_reviews.text: I tried this camera for only a couple of hours before I put it back in the package and returned it. My only reason for the return was the fixed focus and no zoom-in/out during video recording, which my 2-year-old Canon SD1100 IS could do. It otherwise seemed to be a very good camera for an amazing price--good picture quality, good selections of picture modes, various ISO settings, etc. I'd believe this would be a very good camera if you do not care for video recording. However, if you do use this camera for video recording as well, it would not be a good choice and you may consider the 300HS instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tse-Hwa Shen

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera was very affordable, has a lot of fun features I wasn't expecting (try the miniaturization and fisheye ones!) and was perfect in a pinch. My husband has a very nice, very unwieldy camera. I just wanted a camera to take pictures of scenery and friends while on vacation. Couldn't have asked for better. Thanks, Canon for creating such great products!
customer_reviews.author: sun_muse

customer_reviews.title: Nice, handy little camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice , handy little camera. Fits right into my back pocket. Easy to use , good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my lady's birthday. She really does like it after the 10 minutes of menu fussing. Some of the controls are not intuitive at first but after you've realized where they are it becomes second nature to using them. She's already taken a bunch of pictures and really likes the quality. It does pretty well in low light and does extremely good in well lit places.
customer_reviews.author: mTecNic

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Canon camera. It works great. It zooms in a lot and shows you if you are zooming in too much, that the quality might be compromised. Video works great too. It takes the standard card reader. The battery is a little bigger than my last canon camera, which I find frustrating, because you can't use the same charger.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother to replace a 10 year old camera that needed to be shot. She absolutely loves it! Super user friendly (she's in her 70's) and fantastic quality. For the record, this is the 7th or 8th person I've talked into buying an Elph. I think these rock. Buy it - you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: An nice little product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as an all purpose camera for my girlfriend, and the quality of photos between macro and 30 feet is superb. While it lacks a powerful zoom, for what it does the photo quality equals or exceeds any similar sized pocket zoom I own. My girl uses it to the exclusion of her big sx50; it has convinced her that having a small high quality camera you actually use is a far better choice than a big superzoom sitting in your closet!
customer_reviews.author: Pelaro

customer_reviews.title: "LENS ERROR" - after 420 pictures
customer_reviews.text: The camera is incredible at this price. Pictures and videos are very good. I bought it for a vacation trip and took about 420 pictures and some videos until the lens got stock in the open position. The message "Lens Error" was displayed on the screen. I was unable to do anything. The lens was jammed and nothing made it return to normal operation. Please note that the camera had not suffered any harsh treatment only the normal on/off operation. I had to buy another camera but this time I kept away from the Canon ELPH series.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: It was a great little camera at the time of purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a great little camera at the time of purchase. It's been a few years since then. Cameras are now days different and have more options. The only downside is the night shots. Lens aren't very sensitive and flash kills the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my wife and in just a few months, it had a lens error and the lens would not come out and the camera would not function. I returned it to Canon and got a replacement under their warranty, and in less time than the first one...another lens error and a non working camera. I know Canon cameras have a bad reputation for this happening when taken to the beach, but this camera was never used outside. Guess it is Nikon or Panasonic for me from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mocaldoc

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR OUR TEENAGE DAUGHTER & SHE LOVES IT. HAS THE BIG VIEW SCREEN, EASY TO OPERATE, & SHE CAN DOWNLOAD HER PIC EZ. WE HAVE HAD OTHER CANON POINT & SHOOT CAMERAS & LIKED THEM TOO, & THIS ONE IS ANOTHER CAMERA IN OUR FAMILY THAT WILL GET ALOT OF USE.
customer_reviews.author: TALL MAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas -- she's been using for several months now and it's been working very well. The quality of the pictures are very good, she can easily transfer the pictures to her laptop. We have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ABT

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase, both great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for my company, I enjoyed it so much... I got one for myself! The screen is large and clear. It's quick to save photos so I don't waste time in between pictures. It is now my primary point-and-shoot camera for when I don't want to whip out the SLR.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This camera was great while on a three week trip through Europe. The camera takes great pictures and the battery life was outstanding. I was able to take hundreds of pictures each day without re-charging it. Easy to use, with great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's birthday & she loves it! It's about the size of a cell phone & very easy to use & carry in her purse. She loves that it takes great pics in low light areas. I got the carry case & the 8g memory card for her too & she's very happy with it all.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an easy to use camera that could handle my shaky hands. This did marvelously and really helped me record my recent vacation. The presets were fun for someone lacking professional experience and I really have issues with blurry pictures due to shaky hands. I love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole and Sean Gau

customer_reviews.title: Canon Elph 100 HS
customer_reviews.text: A great camera, best one I have had yet. Good for both point to shoot and Ebay pictures. Did not come with a memory card which I found to be a disappointment as I had to run to Wallmart to get one to start shooting. While I was there I found the same camera with card for less than I bought online so be advised.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Taking photo around
customer_reviews.text: Many seniors in my country don't have the chance to record their daily life. So, it's present for dad and mom to share their joys with more people around them.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great photo quality. Came with two batteries very convienent. Small and portable. Easy to get the setting to your liking. Displays will help you with getting the best photo possible.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Baby

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot ELPH 100 impresses
customer_reviews.text: I took this camera on a trip with me to San Francisco a couple of days after i got the camera. I hadn't used it prior to that. I am very impressed by the pictures it took and equally impressed with this seller's quick shipping. I did not pay for expedited shopping, but i got the package in a couple of days from ordering. For the price, you can't beat this tiny, handy camera. Canon has always made a great little digital camera so it doesn't shock me, but for the money...great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Indie Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Battery is good for one trip. It recognizes the scene automatically (sunset,shade,flash etc...). Photo quality is fantastic (I compared most of the top brand's photo quality, no doubt... Canon gives the best photo quality. This is true for this model too).
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while, and haven't had any problems. Great quality pictures. I always have it strapped to my hiking pack, and have come back with some great shots.
customer_reviews.author: beaker

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased-Meets My Camera Needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP based on its' price and the positive reviews that I read about it. The Canon PowerShot fits my need for an easy to use and slip into your pocket stye of camera. I am very pleased with the quality of the photos that it takes. I highly recommend this camera for general picture taking. It offers good quality at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Carl

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to take about 200 pictures a day (I sell online). It's easy to use, and does nice quality pictures. I like the ease of use and big screen on the back. Great video too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Takes beautiful, crisp, clear pictures. Viewing screen is large which works really well for my mom. Very easy to use and lightweight. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Danforth

customer_reviews.title: failed after just 18 mos
customer_reviews.text: Lens refuses to close after just 18 mos. Lots of reports of this on the web. Canon's customer service offer is for a credit to buy a refub, but still at a high price. This is/was last canon product for me....
customer_reviews.author: T. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I got a lemon but...
customer_reviews.text: Even though I thought I did enough research nothing but disappointed with this camera, I am returning it. I tried working with it for a couple hours but could not get good results at all. Poor color, everything is too bright & looks blown out, software doesn't actually work on Windows 7 even with their update. I can get better pictures with my iPhone. Camera came with a gouge on the bottom so I suspect it was returned before.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my sister for Christmas and she loves it! It's simple and easy to use compared to a lot of other cameras and it's not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Miraflor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT, a Great Buy Because It Works and is Durable, Get a Nice Hard Cover for It.
customer_reviews.text: Rocks, durable, high quality, great interfacing with technology, high quality fotos
customer_reviews.author: Pallas89

customer_reviews.title: NOT
customer_reviews.text: I repeat, not sturdy. great features that wont work if you don'coddle this camera. My olde 3 mp is still going
customer_reviews.author: eclectic

customer_reviews.title: the best of canon similar priced cameras
customer_reviews.text: I went on my consumer reports website and three canons were recommended for this price range. I called canon and the lady told me that this was the newest generation of the three and even though this camera had a slightly lower mega pixels rating, it would be for that reason that it would be easier to send pictures over the internet. This was the best camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Passell

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 13 year old daughter. Easy to use and takes great pictures. Over a year of use and she hasn't broken it yet and that is saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Canon Power Shot
customer_reviews.text: Our staff takes a lot of photos on a daily basis and we also required a day and time staff. We have been using Canon PowerShots for a few years now and they are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Lens Problems Here Too
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year. Then lens would not operate properly. They give you a one year wty, and it dies 13 months later.
customer_reviews.author: NO

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I bought for my daughter for Christmas, she's expecting her first child. Has a very large LCD screen, love that!
customer_reviews.author: DEANNA

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it survived Hawaii and that is something to say for me and a camera used it for water pics and wet use at Niagara Falls
customer_reviews.author: chasinokie

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of pictures at work. I don't need high quality pics, but I do need a durable camera. This is the 3rd in the ELPH series that I have owned and it is very solid and durable as were the others. The photo quality is similar to any other point and shoot that I have used over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Elph 100HS
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive little camera. Not as compact as the other Powershots but packs the same features. Bought 2 and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on several digital cameras and finally decided on this one. I've always had Canon cameras as they are the best, and this little jewel made the grade as well. I haven't used it too much but I have found it easy to use and it provides clear images. It was also much less expensive to purchase on Amazon rather than through Best Buy. Kudos to Canon again!
customer_reviews.author: Suz Out West

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for 6 months. I read such great reviews for this camera, so I thought it would be a good fit for me. I am very disappointed with the camera's performance. My pictures are not sharp and the flash seems to wash out people's faces. I previously had a Fugi camera and that took way better pictures than this Cannon. I would not recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Detoll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Video
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Disney World and took pictures and videos. Love the ease of use and the picture and video quality. This is my 2nd Canon camera they really stand up to abuse.
customer_reviews.author: BR1

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: My first digital. Easy to use, sharp pictures,much easier to carry around than my old 35mm. clear instructions. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: MY LITTLE ELPH POWERSHOT
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL LITTLE CAMERA. MY FAVORITE FEATURE IS THE ZOOM. I LOVE TAKING NATURE PHOTOS AND THE ZOOM IS ESSENTIAL, BUT I NEED A SMALL SIZE. THIS IS THE ONE FOR ME.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Lens retract problem
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this camera about 2wks. and already the lens won't retract. I was happy with the different settings and loved the results but can't deal with a camera that is unreliable so i am exploring a Lumix Panasonic..
customer_reviews.author: North Star

customer_reviews.title: Good!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received when they told me I was supposed to be receiving. Satisfied with it and I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera. Easy to hold and carry around in my pocket, has wonderful options for shooting and it is very easy to operate. I will enjoy this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: This cannon is the replacement for Canon PowerShot SD1100IS. I think I made a great choice. I extremely recommand it to anyone looking for simple yet fancy camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sekrapoti

customer_reviews.title: Canon ELPH 100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my daughter. The name will tell it all. Light weight, easy to use and very clear pictures. The only regret I have that this camera would just use regular AA batteries like Duracell or any regular Alkaline batteries. The bottom line is a heck of a camera. Again, so happy I got it from amazon.com. keep up the good work amazon.com. Amazon is the best. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great compact camera. Easy to use. Pictures turn out great. Super to carry every day in case you have a 'Canon' moment. I would highly recommend the purchase, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and video but poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best compact cameras I owned. The pictures taken in low light look awesome. I like the large 3 inch LCD display. The resolution of the LCD display is 230,000 pixels, which is great. The camera fits inside my shirt pocket and I don't need a case to carry with. That said, the camera is built with cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice pictures. Easy to use. Doesn't take sports shots well and won't take multiple images in a row. Great for my daughter though. Great portability
customer_reviews.author: South FL living

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Just love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and love it. Easy to use and take pretty good pictures. Then bought other two as gifts. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: treelover88

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Camera is perfect for those who do not want to fuss with any settings. Takes great pictures in low light or bright sunny days. 1080p video is nice but not great. The avi videos are too large I wish they had some sort of compressions. Over all very happy with this lightweight huge screen camera.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuru80

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Good Camera works good without any issues. Photos come good and battery is good too. Zoom, flash and different modes of image works fine too
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest camera to work and takes great photo's. I would recommend this camera to everyone of any age!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom (Grey)
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It does so many things but the best feature for me is the low light setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Halley

customer_reviews.title: Canon Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports rated this the best camera in this price range and I would have to agree. I have not had the time to use as much as would like but very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Mike

customer_reviews.title: great little camera!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a awesome camera!! has all the features I want, takes great photos and video is great!! very easy to use! the negatives about this camera is that the buttons are too small. the video for this version( canon powershot 100 HS) has only digital zoom for the video, while the canon powershot 300 HS has optical zoom for video taking. if that is not a problem and you want to save $30-40 dollars then this is the camera for you. I noticed people reviewing this camera don't even understand the difference...canon is well known for designing great cameras, you can't go wrong with the canon powershot 100 HS
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Canon Elph 100
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as an early Christmas gift for my son and family. They love the cameras ease of use and the great pictures it takes. Great price and quick shipping at Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled to have my camera back since damaging ...
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to have my camera back since damaging my original Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS last December. Thank you for having quality patrons. Edie Granger
customer_reviews.author: Edie Granger

customer_reviews.title: My opinion of the Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and understand directions. Pleased with the quality of the pictures. This is the second time I have purchased this model. I dropped the first and chose to replace it with the same model.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot and more camera
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Great pictures. Only downside is the complex menu structure. Wish they had a 'favorites' feature so I could easily get to the handful of modes I use.
customer_reviews.author: kmr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY---GREAT CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my kodak pocket camera and needed a replacement---looked and this is an older version, but still being sold--BEST CAMERA EVER!!! Fast, easy to use and I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: southernbell

customer_reviews.title: Lens Error after only 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame the camera seems to suffer from a serious design flaw. I was very happy with the camera until it suddenly developed the fatal "Lens Error" problem after two months of exceedingly gentle use. Buyer beware: don't take your chances with such a poorly engineered camera.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper2000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very easy to use, has a lot of special features, an awesome zoom and just the right size. It take better pictures than my iphone! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I receive my camara faster and in excellent conditions thanks for everything I recomend it sincerely the only problem is that the color I receive it wasn't that a choose, but does not bother me bye
customer_reviews.author: jailyn carrasquel

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera because of the image stabilization. It does not do what we expected. Many of the pictures are blurred. The color is also too vivid, almost looking 'cartoonish'. However, it takes good pics much of the time. If we can think through before we take the pic as to set the appropriate flash or setting (it has only a few settings) then we can avoid the blur and the weird color problem. But when taking pics of kids or pets its a bit hard to switch modes and flash settings quickly enough. I would not recommend this camera for anyone with children. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sla

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself takes fine pictures, but the buttons used to select the shooting menus are damaged. All buttons work as if they were the 'right' arrow button! I am highly disappointed in my order!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great, dependable camera!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great resolution. Have recommended to several friends who have purchased the same or upgrades, with same satisfied results.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: After an experimental period with a Samsung digital camera, we have happily returned to the world of quick snap shots, good pic quality, and fun effects with our cannon. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: best little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and is really easy to use! The price was great and we recived it very quicly. Thank you our daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, feels good, nice pictures. Simple, easy to use, basic camera for the right price. Nothing fancy just quick, easy, clear pictures.
customer_reviews.author: choey

customer_reviews.title: good camera....until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: i was loving it until i got the infamous lens error about 2 months after purchase. i hadn't used it that much. seems to be a common problem with these things. i am sending it to the manufacturer for repair. we'll see how that goes....
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera alot! Its so much better than the Samsung I had purchased for the same price about a year ago!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes really great pictures, Fair zoom, but what can you expect for a small compact camera. Fits in shirt pocket, and is light weight. Lots of features for a camera this size. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: C. Locke

customer_reviews.title: So back to my old Kodak e-z share Z812 that I bought 8 years ago and still works better than this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is OK. I was hoping for a easier camera to use for my quick shots. Have not used this camera in months because some how there is dirt INSIDE my lenses. So back to my old Kodak e-z share Z812 that I bought 8 years ago and still works better than this camera. Never buy Canon again
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Budget Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This digital camera is good for daily use and if you don't care about the picture quality. Plus, it is very user-friendly and nothing really technical involved. One con side is "Made in China" so I don't expect this camera will survive more than 2 years life span.
customer_reviews.author: SAN_MARINO

customer_reviews.title: That is what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted and it came quickly. It is a Christmas present so I won't know if it is working until then.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Kunsman

customer_reviews.title: get this camera!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No other camera can come close to this one! Fun little camera! Good for beginers and experts!!!!! I would for sure choose no other camera then this one!!!!!!!!!!!! I love canon!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: grate
customer_reviews.text: its a amazeng camra that has tunes of opthins it has rely good qualty and is rely easy to yose
customer_reviews.author: Adina Moshavi

customer_reviews.title: How the heck do you attach the wrist strap!
customer_reviews.text: Just rcvd the camera last night, and will report back after using it. It looks like a great little camera. I'm currently charging the battery but spent too much time last night trying to attach the wrist strap - finally gave up. What's the secret, people?
customer_reviews.author: Fizz

customer_reviews.title: I am returning...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple point and shoot camera that took decent quality pictures and was fairly easy to use. This camera did not have any of these qualities. The pictures I took were washed out. The camera menu was not simple. You have to push down on the button very hard and hold it to take a picture and then it takes so long for the photo to actually shoot that your subject has moved. I was very disappointed and am returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lens Error!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received the camera in 3 days. It worked fine the first day. I took few picture the second day and the lens won't retract. I tried restarting the camera, removing batteries etc... nothing worked. I returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: parx

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to buy this item. It does not work properly. the pictures are not clear. The video camera breaks the sequence.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Used for quite a while before we got cell phones
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah G Carver

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom (Grey) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:GreyCanon's 4928001 PowerShot ELPH 100 HS Gray 12MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Zoom and 3.0 In. LCD Display is what you need to add that creative edge. Canon's HS SYSTEM takes the frustration out of low light shooting. The system delivers clear, blur-free shots with the ambiance intact, and frees you from the sometimes unwanted effects of using the flash. Beautiful low light shots are possible at both low and high ISO speeds, and the dynamic range is expanded to retain maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas. It features Full 1080p HD video for exceptional quality and keeps footage stabilized with Dynamic IS.

What's in the box

PowerShot ELPH 100 HS Body
Battery Pack NB-4L
Battery Charger CB-2LV
Wrist Strap WS-DC11
AV Cable AVC-400
USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU
Digital Camera Solution CD-ROM

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

Experience the Power.

Canon's HS SYSTEM with a 12.1 Megapixel CMOS and DIGIC 4 Image Processor improves shooting in low-light situations without the need for a flash and lowers noise levels at higher ISO settings.
The Canon HS SYSTEM takes the frustration out of low light shooting. The system delivers clear, blur-free shots with all the ambiance intact, and frees you from the sometimes unwanted effects of using the flash. Beautiful low light shots are possible at both low and high ISO speeds, and the dynamic range is expanded to retain maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas.

The system is the result of two technologies brought together in a compact PowerShot. The first is the 12.1 Megapixel CMOS Sensor, which positions the light-receiving surface for optimal light reception. More light means clearer, blur-free images with plenty of detail and nuance, even in dark areas. Working together with the CMOS sensor to deliver the HS SYSTEM is Canon's advanced DIGIC 4 Image Processor, which actively reduces noise and delivers high speed image processing.



Memorable Moments in Spectacular Full HD.

Full 1080p HD Video for exceptional quality with stereo sound, plus a dedicated movie button for easy access. Zoom optically while shooting video and keep footage stabilized with Dynamic IS.



Experiencing the brilliance of Full 1080p HD video in a Canon PowerShot ELPH digital camera has never been easier. With the convenient dedicated movie button, you'll be able to instantly record everyday moments in amazing life-like realism at a push of a button. You can also operate the optical zoom while shooting video so you can get in close–but don't worry about shaky footage because Dynamic IS will help keep your videos steady! 



A PowerShot that Keeps Up with the Action.
Get high-speed shooting in a point-and-shoot camera: High-speed Burst Mode captures 8.2fps and Super Slow Motion Movie records video at high speeds to allow slow motion playback.
Sometimes, the action just won't stop for you. The PowerShot ELPH 100 HS digital camera is equipped with High-speed Burst Mode that can capture 8.2 frames per second, letting you catch the sequence of the action–a feature great for using at sport events! 

You can also add a fun slow motion effect to you videos with Super Slow Motion Movie. Super Slow Motion Movie will record your clips at a high speed so that when you watch your videos, they'll play back in slow motion–a feature also useful for analyzing a play-by-play of sports moves! 

Advanced Smart AUTO for Stills and Videos that Shine.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on 32 predefined shooting situations.
The PowerShot ELPH 100 HS digital camera takes the quality of your still images and videos to a whole new level - automatically. The camera's advanced Smart AUTO system detects a wealth of information about the scene you're shooting, then automatically selects the optimal settings for you. Now with an expanded range of 32 shooting scenarios, the camera handles a wide variety of situations, freeing you up to concentrate on composing your shot and capturing the moment you're looking for. From portraits to landscapes to action scenes, the PowerShot ELPH 100 HS digital camera has you covered whether you're shooting stills or videos.


Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 Functions
Canon PowerShot ELPH Series Feature Comparison Chart 
 * Smart AUTO
   The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.
 * P Program
   Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.
 * Av Aperture-priority
   You define the aperture to either isolate your subject or have clarity throughout the entire picture, and the camera will choose the corresponding shutter speed.
 * Tv Shutter-priority
   You select the shutter speed to stop or blur action, and the camera finds the appropriate aperture. With slow exposure times, Canon's noise reduction system activates to ensure low image noise.
 * Movie Digest Mode
   Records a video clip before capturing a still image and then combines one day's worth of clips into a video.
 * Portrait
   The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject pop.
 * Kids & Pets
   Reduced focusing time freezes fast-moving subjects, so you won't miss those special shots.
 * Smart Shutter
   The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame.
 * High-speed Burst
   The camera shoots continuously at a high speed of approx. 8.2fps while you hold down the shutter.
 * Best Image Selection
   The camera takes five photos in succession, and then chooses the best one out of the bunch.
 * Handheld Night Scene
   Suppresses image blur even without the help of a tripod.
 * Low Light
   For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations.
 * Fisheye Effect
   Add a classic photo distortion without a fisheye lens.
 * Miniature Effect for Movies & Stills
   Emphasizes perspective for a miniature effect by blurring upper and bottom portions of videos and stills.
 * Toy Camera Effect
   Simulates photos taken with "toy" or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect.
 * Creative Light Effect
   Transform background bright spots to stars, hearts, music motes and more.
 * Monochrome
   Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.
 * Super Vivid
   Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.
 * Poster Effect
   Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.
 * Color Accent
   Choose to retain a single color in your image while other colors turn monochrome.
 * Color Swap
   Select a color and replace it with a color you specify for special effects.
 * Beach
   Get clear shots of people at a sunny beach without darkened faces.
 * Foliage
   Capture brilliant shots of autumn foliage, greenery and blossoms.
 * Snow
   Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.
 * Fireworks
   Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.
 * Stitch Assist
   Build awe-inspiring panoramas by neatly aligning sequential images.

About the Camera
Use the touch panel LCD for easy, fun operation. Ultra wide angle lens gets more in your shot
Take this camera everywhere! Full HD, cool scence modes and Smart AUTO make shooting a breeze!
Value in price but not in features. The HS SYSTEM, full HD Video in a small, compact frame, five colors
Feature Call Out
Touch Panel, F2 lens, HS SYSTEM, HD Video, Movie Digest, Smart AUTO
Slim and Sexy! Ultra compact, and ultra wide angle, HD Video, HS SYSTEM, Movie Digest
Value price, HD Video, HS SYSTEM, Movie Digest, Smart AUTO

Movie Shoot in Full HD (1920 x 1080) at 24 fps for up to 14 min. 53 sec. or 4GB per clip. Shoot in HD (1280 x 720) at 24 fps for up to 21 min. and 23 sec. or 4GB per clip. Shoot in VGA (640 x 480) at 30 fps for up to 46 min. and 46 sec. or 4GB per clip and QVGA (320 x 240 at 30 fps) for up to 2 hours 23 min. and 41 sec. or 4GB per clip.


Super Slow Motion Movie Record your clips in high speed (approx. 240fps), and then watch your videos in slow motion.


Canon Helps You Get Great Quality Easily.
4x Optical Zoom with a Wide-Angle lens (28Ð112mm) Optical Image Stabilizer and a 3.0-inch PureColor System LCD.
The PowerShot ELPH 100 HS digital camera has the tools you need to photograph every moment in crisp, clear Canon quality. From wide-angle to telephoto, the 28mm Wide-Angle 4x Optical Zoom Lens lets you capture more into every shot. The Optical Image Stabilizer will also help keep all your images steady.




The big and bright 3.0-inch PureColor System LCD screen lets you see everything easily, so whether you're trying to frame a shot or just reviewing your images, Canon helps you get the best image every time. 
3.0-inch PureColor System LCD screen


3.0-inch PureColor System LCD screen


Easily Turn Your Memories into Videos.
Movie Digest Mode records a short video clip right before shooting a still image and then combines one day's worth of clips into one video.
Putting together a video containing highlights from family vacations, important occasions and other special events is now easier than you might imagine. Using the Movie Digest Mode, you can have the camera automatically record a short video clip (up to approximately 4 seconds) every time you shoot a still image. The camera will then combine an entire day's worth of clips into a single video. No editing required Ð Movie Digest Mode does all the work, so you can sit back and enjoy your video!

Add some Fun to Your Photos!
New scene modes, Toy Camera Effect and Monochrome, add an artistic look to your photos.


Add some vintage nostalgia with Toy Camera Effect. Toy Camera Effect recreates this look by darkening the edges to make them appear is if they were photographed through a pinhole lens and adding contrast. 


Monochrome lets you sway away from the usual black & white combination. Now you can choose from three single-toned effects: Black & White, Sepia or Blue to really give your photos the effect you're looking for.
